thread.title: The Soft Colors and Curves of Antelope Canyon
thread.title_full: The Soft Colors and Curves of Antelope Canyon

author: Gary
title: The Soft Colors and Curves of Antelope Canyon
text:
The Soft Colors and Curves of Antelope Canyon 
Camera NIKON D200 Aperture f/4 Exposure Time 1/45 
I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again. Antelope Canyon might be the most photogenic place on Earth. It is hard to take a bad photo when you are there. If you visit in the middle of the day (and it is one of the few places that you want to photograph in the middle of the day) you’ll have crowds of people, but you don’t have to worry too much about them ruining your photos because you can always point your camera up. 
I’m considering maybe doing a workshop in that part of Arizona so we can visit many of the big photo attractions which are within a short distance of each other. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
